```{r imports}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r strings}

quote1 = "Insert an inspirational quote here. - Someone Famous"

#use writeLines to print the variable as a string without quotes
writeLines(quote1)

#using escape characters
quote2 = "\"Insert an inspirational quote here.\" - Someone Famous"

#printing the above with quotation marks
writeLines(quote2)

#concatenating strings
quote3 = c("INSERT", "INSPIRATIONAL", "QUOTE", "HERE.", "-SOMEONE", "FAMOUS")

#length of each word
str_length(quote3)

#Separating words using blank space
quote3_new = str_c(quote3, collapse = " ")

#grab specific range of values
str_sub(quote3_new,8,20)

#specific range of values at the end of string
str_sub(quote3_new,-6,-1)

```
